item.title: 简单的线性回归
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 导入包 import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 导入数据 data = pd.read_csv("./datasets/studentscores.csv") data.head() Hours Scores 0 2.5 21 1 5.1 47 2 3.2 27 3 8.5 75 4 3.5 30 数据处理 X = data.iloc[:,:1].values Y = data.iloc[:,1].values from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split X_train,X_test,Y_train,Y_test = train_test_split(X,Y,test_size=1/4,random_state=0) 训练模型 from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression regressor = LinearRegression() regressor =
